'''''Amanita roseotincta''''' is a species of [[agaric]] [[fungus]] in the family [[Amanitaceae]] found in North America. It was first described by American mycologist [[William Alphonso Murrill]] in 1914 as a species of ''Venenarius'' before being transferred to ''[[Amanita]]'' the same year.<ref name="Murrill 1914"/>
